2022-04-10T07:06:20Z: With that we'll call time on this live coverage of the Australian GP. Thanks for following along, we'll be back in two weeks at Imola for the Emilia Romagna GP - the first sprint race weekend of 2022.
2022-04-10T07:06:06Z: Until then have a lovely Sunday and go well! Cheers!
2022-04-10T07:04:35Z: With that we'll call time on this live coverage of the Australian GP. Thanks for following along, we'll be back in two weeks at Imola for the Emilia Romagna GP - the first sprint race weekend of 2022.
2022-04-10T06:59:52Z: And here's the latest F1 drivers' standings:
2022-04-10T06:54:42Z: Come the end of 2022 that could be a massive race in terms of the championship fight, with Leclerc picking up a maximum score and Verstappen taking a big fat zero. Only 20 more races to find out. That's twenty. Oh my.
2022-04-10T06:50:34Z:
Here's the full race report on the Australian GP as Leclerc scores a dominant win:
https://www.autosport.com/f1/news/f1-australian-gp-leclerc-scores-dominant-win-as-verstappen-retires/9768584/
2022-04-10T06:49:05Z: Leclerc and company stand to attention to the winners' national anthems as is customary. The Monegasque and Italian anthems work really well together, very jolly.
2022-04-10T06:47:09Z: The drivers' head to the podium, which has a balcony at the top for photographers and the TV cameras which looks very fancy.
2022-04-10T06:44:55Z: Leclerc now has a 34-point lead in the drivers' standings and records a grand slam at the Australian GP: Pole position, led from start to finish, won the race and got the fastest lap.
2022-04-10T06:38:19Z: Leclerc leaps into the arms of his Ferrari mechanics to start the celebrations. After Verstappen dropped out of the race he did have it easy, but in truth he was in control of the race from start to finish.
2022-04-10T06:34:48Z: Norris leads home McLaren team-mate Ricciardo for fifth and sixth, with Ocon seventh for Alpine, Bottas eighth for Alfa Romeo and Gasly ninth for AlphaTauri.
2022-04-10T06:33:42Z: Albon does eventually make his mandatory pit stop in final moments and manages to snare the final world championship point in P10. A great drive from the Williams racer, well deserved.
2022-04-10T06:33:39Z: Leclerc also sets the fastest lap of the race with his final effort of 1m20.260s - he needed that as Alonso put in a 1m20.846s which would have beaten his previous best and lost him the bonus point.
2022-04-10T06:32:27Z: Perez takes second place for Red Bull, as Russell takes his first podium for Mercedes in third place with Hamilton in fourth place.
2022-04-10T06:31:36Z: Leclerc wins the Australian GP for Ferrari! An utterly dominant performance!
2022-04-10T06:30:53Z: Leclerc begins the final lap with a 19.6 lead over Perez. Start the car.
2022-04-10T06:29:47Z: Hamilton's hopes of the podium appear to be over as he drops a couple of seconds behind Russell with two laps to go.
2022-04-10T06:28:40Z: Bottas has passed Gasly for ninth now as we head into the closing stages.
2022-04-10T06:27:44Z: Leclerc is still concerned about going for the fastest lap of the race. He has it with a half-second advantage to nearest challenger to that lap time, Russell, but he wants to ensure he maximises this result with the bonus point.
2022-04-10T06:27:29Z: Alonso has come into the pits to switched to a fresh set of mediums. He was struggling with his tyres and was outside of the points.
2022-04-10T06:25:45Z: We are onto lap 54/58 and Albon is yet to stop. The Williams driver is holding seventh.
2022-04-10T06:25:34Z: Leclerc probably has time to check in for his flight home, such is the size of his advantage at the front, with a 20.2s lead over Perez.
2022-04-10T06:25:00Z: Alonso is struggling with this set of tyres. It has been one of those promising weekends that has got away from the Spaniard.
2022-04-10T06:23:46Z: Zhou is all over the rear wing of Alonso. The Alfa Romeo driver passes the double world champion into Turn 1 for P12. Alonso now drops to 14th behind Magnussen.
2022-04-10T06:23:05Z: Perez runs wide and dips two wheels on to the grass at Turn 13, which allows Russell to move to within four seconds of him. More of that and he'll cheaply throw away his second place.
2022-04-10T06:22:08Z: Schumacher runs wide at Turn 1 and drops down to 15th spot.
2022-04-10T06:21:29Z: Hamilton is inching towards DRS range of Russell but so far hasn't looked to seriously attack his team-mate for the final podium place.
2022-04-10T06:21:15Z: Just as we type that Gasly passes Stroll into Turn 1 for ninth. Bottas is trying to pass the Aston Martin driver now.
2022-04-10T06:20:25Z: Stroll is continuing to hold up a host of cars in the battle for ninth. He does still have a five-second penalty which will drop him out of the points as it stands.
2022-04-10T06:19:55Z: Despite wanting to do it at the end of the race, Leclerc has improved on his fastest lap with a 1m20.966s.
2022-04-10T06:16:54Z: Into the final 10 laps and Leclerc is slowly extending his lead at the front over Perez. 14.1s is the gap, while further back Russell still has a 1.4s gap to Hamilton in the fight for third.
2022-04-10T06:15:43Z: Big train of cars building behind Stroll. In that queue, Alonso passes Schumacher  for P12 at Turn 3.
2022-04-10T06:14:24Z: Ocon has been told to lift and coast as much as he can to manage his Alpine's temperatures. The Frenchman is sitting in eighth but should take seventh once Albon, who is ahead, pits.
2022-04-10T06:13:14Z: This race is also turning into a solid day for McLaren with Norris in fifth 1.5s ahead of team-mate Ricciardo in sixth. Given how the team's first two races went, that'll be a huge boost.
2022-04-10T06:12:22Z: Stewards say no further action for the Stroll v Bottas Turn 3 incident.
2022-04-10T06:11:30Z: Stroll has been handed a five second penalty for weaving on the main straight. Stewards have also noted the incident with Bottas at Turn 3.
2022-04-10T06:10:41Z: At the front Leclerc has the freedom of Albert Park with a 12.7s lead over Perez with Verstappen out of the running.
2022-04-10T06:10:10Z: Some hard racing between Stroll and Bottas. Bottas had to take evasive action at Turn 3 The Alfa Romeo driver is not happy with that move! Stroll is now in P9 and Gasly has also managed to get by Bottas for P10.
2022-04-10T06:08:56Z: With Verstappen out of the race that has lifted Perez up to second and Russell back into the podium places. Hamilton might have a say in that as he is just 1.4s back on his team-mate.
2022-04-10T06:08:12Z: Albon sits in seventh but the Williams driver has elected not to take a stop under the virtual safety car.
2022-04-10T06:07:16Z: Alonso has rejoined the race after his stop in P12 while Magnussen has filed back into P17.
2022-04-10T06:07:15Z: The Virtual Safety Car is over and we are back to green flag running.
2022-04-10T06:05:57Z: Alonso and Magnussen pit under the virtual safety car.
2022-04-10T06:05:11Z: He's told to pull over by his Red Bull team and a fire has started at the rear of his Red Bull. The Virtual Safety Car has been deployed.
2022-04-10T06:04:18Z: Verstappen has stopped at Turn 2! He's out of the race!
2022-04-10T06:03:59Z: Leclerc responds and flexes his Ferrari's muscles with a 1m21.291s. The gap is now up to seven seconds.
2022-04-10T06:03:14Z: Verstappen is fighting back with a new fastest lap of the race of 1m21.677s to close the gap to 5.1s to Leclerc.
2022-04-10T06:02:47Z: Norris is closing up on Alonso as the battle for sixth intensifies. Alonso is yet to pit.
2022-04-10T06:02:04Z: Russell does put up a fight, defending at Turns 9-10 but loses momentum which allows Perez to charge around the outside at Turn 11. It was fun while it lasted.
2022-04-10T06:01:49Z: The stewards are going to investigate a possible safety car infringement between Tsunoda, Schumacher and Gasly after the race.
2022-04-10T05:59:44Z: Or not as Russell defends his position at Turn 3 and is currently matching Perez's pace. Bet Perez wishes the fourth DRS zone was still in play.
2022-04-10T05:59:26Z: Ricciardo has managed to get by Magnussen for P8 now. That would have gone down well in front of this packed Melbourne crowd.
2022-04-10T05:58:07Z: Perez is within DRS range of Russell in the fight for the final podium place. Attention to those at Turn 3, Perez is coming.
2022-04-10T05:57:42Z: Norris makes use of DRS to take P7 from Magnussen on the start/finish straight. Good pass.
2022-04-10T05:57:07Z: There's another one, as Leclerc puts in a 1m22.023s on lap 33, to move 4.4s clear. Verstappen simply cannot respond.
2022-04-10T05:56:54Z: Norris attempts to pass Magnussen around the outside at Turn 3. He's denied.
2022-04-10T05:55:25Z: Magnussen is starting to come under pressure from the McLarens of Norris and Ricciardo. Remember, the Haas driver is yet to stop.
2022-04-10T05:55:18Z: Apart from his tardy second safety car restart Leclerc is putting in a flawless performance. He's opened up the gap at the front to 3.4s with a new fastest race lap of 1m22.450s.
2022-04-10T05:53:52Z: It is 2007 all over again as Hamilton gets by Alonso at Turn 1. With the aid of DRS the Mercedes driver eases ahead and up to fifth place.
2022-04-10T05:52:23Z: Impressively Stroll is just on the fringes of the top 10 in 12th having made three stops, one more than anyone else. The Aston Martin driver has taken advantage of both safety cars.
2022-04-10T05:52:20Z: Double DRS delight again for Perez as he breezes by Alonso at Turn 3 to take fourth place. He'll now set off after Russell who is two seconds ahead.
2022-04-10T05:50:56Z: The incident between Schumacher and Tsunoda on the restart has been noted by the stewards.
2022-04-10T05:50:28Z: Leclerc has kept his cool at the front and is already 1.8s up the road on Verstappen two laps after the restart. That Ferrari has pace in abundance today.
2022-04-10T05:49:24Z: Albon has also cycled up into the points in P10 for Williams but he is yet to pit.
2022-04-10T05:49:06Z: Russell also fends off an attack from Alonso at the restart through the second sector. It appears those on older tyres were able to fire them up faster than those on newer rubber.
2022-04-10T05:47:54Z: Leclerc makes a poor restart at the front and Verstappen pulls alongside on the main straight but is stuck on the outside of Turn 1 so cannot make the move stick.
2022-04-10T05:47:45Z: Schumacher was lucky not to touch the back of Tusnoda just before the restart.
2022-04-10T05:46:49Z: Alonso is the outlier in the frontrunners having not pitted on his hards and sits in fourth place ahead of Perez and Hamilton.
2022-04-10T05:45:48Z: Magnussen has climbed to P7 now but the Haas driver is yet to pit.
2022-04-10T05:45:12Z: The safety car is coming in at the end of lap 26.
2022-04-10T05:43:11Z: Leclerc and Ferrari won't be so happy about the safety car given it as wiped out his healthy lead built up over the first half of this race. Verstappen is once again tucked up under his rear wing.
2022-04-10T05:43:03Z: A flurry of action in the pits under the safety car. Stroll has made his third stop of the race now.
2022-04-10T05:41:17Z: Replays show Vettel dropped his Aston Martin on the Turn 4 kerb and finds the barriers. Plenty of damage to the front of the car.
2022-04-10T05:41:14Z: Russell has massively profited in this safety car period as he makes a cheap pitstop and rejoins in third place ahead of both Perez and Hamilton. He must be buzzing.
2022-04-10T05:39:50Z: Safety Car deployed. Vettel has stopped on track at Turn 5.
2022-04-10T05:39:35Z: Hamilton had come out ahead of Perez but on cold tyres he can't keep the Red Bull at bay for long, as the Mexican takes fifth place at Turn 10.
2022-04-10T05:39:18Z: But Norris responds and takes the eighth position back from the Aussie.
2022-04-10T05:38:42Z: Ricciardo has managed to jump his McLaren team-mate Lando Norris now the pit stop shake up is complete.
2022-04-10T05:38:18Z: Leclerc makes his stop at the end of lap 22 and retains the lead after Hamilton also pitted at the same time.
2022-04-10T05:37:21Z: A lap later Ricciardo makes his stop in the McLaren, another 2.4s stop, and comes out directly in front of Albon at the apex of Turn 1!
2022-04-10T05:37:20Z: Gasly and Zhou pit and rejoin behind Ocon in P15 and P16.
2022-04-10T05:36:07Z: Perez, on the hards, comes out in ninth place, with Norris also on the hards back out in 12th.
2022-04-10T05:35:21Z: Bottas has moved into the points in P9 but the Alfa Romeo driver is yet to make a stop.
2022-04-10T05:35:18Z: At the end of lap 21 Perez pits to release Hamilton behind him. Norris has also pitted from sixth place.
2022-04-10T05:34:13Z: Hamilton has stormed up to the rear of Perez and is looking to repay the favour at Turn 3. The Mercedes driver has a look but thinks better of it. Perez's pace has fallen off a cliff.
2022-04-10T05:33:24Z: Alonso dives underneath Gasly for P8 at Turn 3. The pair are behind Verstappen in P7 following his stop.
2022-04-10T05:32:49Z: Verstappen is called in for a pitstop and takes on fresh hards, coming out directly in front of Gasly and Alonso in seventh place. That was close.
2022-04-10T05:31:50Z: Leclerc is producing an unforgiving pace at the front with a 8.6s lead on Verstappen.
2022-04-10T05:30:59Z: Ocon is the first of the top 10 to pit from P8 on lap 18/58. The Alpine driver rejoins in P17 on the hard tyres.
2022-04-10T05:30:40Z: Perez is keeping pace with Verstappen but the gaps between the frontrunners is slowly expanding as this stint continues on. The Mexican is 4.7s off his team-mate.
2022-04-10T05:29:44Z: Bottas takes P11 from Tsunoda. Magnussen tucked up behind the Japanese driver runs across the grass at Turn 11-12 while trying to pass Tsunoda. Lucky boy.
2022-04-10T05:27:39Z: Bit more action in pit lane now. Schumacher is next to take service after his little moment at Turn 12.
2022-04-10T05:26:46Z: Latifi is the next driver to venture into the pits for Williams. Hard tyres fitted.
2022-04-10T05:26:06Z: Kevin Magnussen has climbed up to P13 now. The Dane takes advantage of a mistake from haas team-mate Mick Schumacher who runs wide at Turn 12. Haas have struggled for pace this weekend having been unable to nail the set up on its cars.
2022-04-10T05:25:44Z: As expected the Mercedes pair are not able to keep pace with the front three, with Hamilton almost three seconds behind Perez and has Russell, Norris and Ricciardo tucked up behind him.
2022-04-10T05:23:49Z: Vettel apologises to his team over the radio for his error that resulted in a visit to a gravel trap. Tough times down at Aston Martin.
2022-04-10T05:22:50Z: Leclerc puts in another fastest lap to increase his lead to three seconds.
2022-04-10T05:21:35Z: Perez lost around five seconds to the leaders stuck behind Hamilton, as Leclerc's lead on Verstappen grows to 1.8s.
2022-04-10T05:21:28Z: Vettel has run off the road but has got going again, and is now last behind Aston Martin team-mate Stroll.
2022-04-10T05:20:14Z: On lap 10 Perez moves up to third place ahead of Hamilton. He uses the double dose of DRS at the start of the lap and dives up the inside at Turn 3.
2022-04-10T05:18:57Z: Leclerc puts in a new fastest lap of 1m23.589s to pull out a 1.2s lead on Verstappen and perhaps crucially out of DRS range. Behind Perez is losing touch with the front two behind Hamilton.
2022-04-10T05:15:49Z: Leclerc makes a smooth restart to keep the lead into Turn 1 as everyone else keeps in line to go racing again.
2022-04-10T05:14:39Z: Another rule clarification that came this weekend was on the safety car restart rules, basically you can't pull alongside the car in front. Verstappen has been given that reminder over team radio.
2022-04-10T05:14:14Z: Tsunoda has enjoyed a strong start in the AlphaTauri, moving ahead of Bottas' Alfa Romeo to P11.
2022-04-10T05:13:16Z: The safety car is coming in at the end of lap six as Sainz's Ferrari is cleared away.
2022-04-10T05:12:34Z: Stroll has come into the pits again. He switched from hards to mediums in the first stop and then changed back to hards in the second stop.
2022-04-10T05:10:55Z: None of the frontrunners have gambled for a very early pitstop yet, with 53 laps to go in the race and track position usually vital at Albert Park.
2022-04-10T05:10:16Z: Local fans will be happy Ricciardo has had a clean start. The Aussie sits in P7 where he started on the grid ahead of Ocon, Gasly and Alonso. Stroll has come into the pits under the safety car.
2022-04-10T05:08:21Z: The Virtual Safety Car has turned into a full safety car now. So everyone will bunch up for a restart.
2022-04-10T05:08:04Z: Wow. Replays show Sainz was lucky not to collect any of his rivals after losing control on the grass at the fast sweeper.
2022-04-10T05:07:34Z: The Virtual Safety Car has been deployed with Sainz stuck at the side of the track.
2022-04-10T05:07:04Z: Leclerc has a 0.7s lead at the end of the second lap over Verstappen, with Hamilton 1.5s back on the Red Bull.
2022-04-10T05:06:57Z: Sainz is now beached in the gravel at the exit of Turn 10.
2022-04-10T05:05:44Z: Sainz has lost another position on the opening lap. He sits in P14 having started on the hard tyres.
2022-04-10T05:05:40Z: Norris drops to sixth behind Russell at the start, a really poor start for the McLaren driver, but no major dramas on the first lap.
2022-04-10T05:04:46Z: Slow start for Carlos Sainz. The Ferrari driver drops from P9 down to P13.
2022-04-10T05:04:22Z: The Australian GP is go! Leclerc keeps the lead from Verstappen and Hamilton is up to third place at Turn 1 - super start by the Mercedes driver!
2022-04-10T05:02:48Z: All away cleanly on the formation lap, as the F1 car snake makes its way to the starting grid. Here we go.
2022-04-10T05:01:58Z: As the formation lap gets underway, it is worth keeping an eye on Alonso, starting from P10. There was plenty of work being carried out on his car on the grid.
2022-04-10T05:00:32Z: The tyre blankets are coming off and the formation lap is about to start.
2022-04-10T04:58:40Z: Tyre news: Sainz, Alonso, Magnussen, Vettel, Stroll and Albon all start on the hards, everyone else starts on the mediums.
2022-04-10T04:56:16Z: According to Pirelli's tyre data, this race is fully expected to be a one-stopper if everything goes to plan, starting on the mediums before switching to the hards. Let's see how many go for an alternative strategy.
2022-04-10T04:53:39Z: A story which grabbed attention at the start of the weekend was the reminder in the race directors' notes that the drivers cannot wear jewellery in the cars, but Hamilton still has a few ear piercings on as he puts on his balaclava. There is a grace period for this, but that could cause trouble.
2022-04-10T04:50:03Z: Weather watch: Bright and sunny conditions and there is a 0% chance of rain for the race, with air temp at a pleasant 26.1c and track temp at 31.9c. Lovely.
2022-04-10T04:46:46Z: It is time for the national anthem and for anthem fans out there the Australian one is a banger. Ricciardo's smile is almost breaking through his mask as he nods along to Advance Australia Fair.
2022-04-10T04:43:36Z: So, Leclerc vs Verstappen at the front which feels like a theme of 2022 so far. It is 1-1 between them, who can strike in Australia? Or will a surprise package emerge?
2022-04-10T04:39:37Z: The atmosphere at Albert Park is building nicely having been a party atmosphere all weekend. An estimated 420,000 fans have made it to the track over the full Australian GP which is fantastic after so long away.
2022-04-10T04:36:32Z: It has been three years since the last Australian GP - given the 2020 event didn't get further than Thursday - a long time since a race in this part of the world. A warm welcome to our friends in Europe, what's the strategy, coffee or something stronger?
2022-04-10T04:32:56Z: G'day one and all! Just a little under 30 minutes until lights out for the Australian GP - who is excited?
